alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Henry; Scott; Woodford (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 19 at 4:56PM EDT until May 19 at 5:30PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Louisville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Woodford County in central Kentucky... West central Scott County in central Kentucky... Southeastern Henry County in central Kentucky... Franklin County in central Kentucky... * Until 530 PM EDT. * At 456 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Frankfort, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Woodford, west central Scott, southeastern Henry and Franklin Counties, including the following locations... Bryant, Slickway, Duval, Benson, Polsgrove, Capital City Airport, Broadville Manor, Woodlake, Orville and Peaks Mill. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
